Articles.Content:
For a not so witty guy.

Hey, everyone. I'm SomeoneD; but I prefer Luke. I'm a computer science student and a player of games, and what finally spurred me into joining the forum is that I am getting into development for KSP - in the forms of plugins and useful programs.

At the minute I'm working on a GUI for editing part types overall; with plans to make a tech tree editor, as well.

A pleasure to meet you all; I'm sure I'll be hanging around a lot.

(It goes without saying that Kerbal is awesome.)
